caption: This photograph depicts a large quantity of logs floating on the surface of a calm, dark lake. The logs are scattered across the foreground and middle-ground of the image with some forming loose clusters. The background features a densely wooded area with various types of trees, including both coniferous and deciduous species. The sky appears to be somewhat cloudy, suggesting overcast weather conditions. The overall setting suggests a serene, natural environment potentially used for log transportation or storage in a forested lake region. The image composition focuses on the interaction between the natural wooded landscape and the man-made aspect of the logging activity.
title: Logs clog shoreline of St. Croix River above Georgia Pacific paper mill
